description: Plural. Heading for the number of matched media
Singular. Label for a button that opens the media item the user is currently viewing.

Label for a button that lets the user set the media item they are clicking to be the 'main' one, conceptually. It replaces whatever the current main item is, and that main item becomes a child (like this one they are clicking, effectively swapping places).
Label for a button that lets the user set the media item they are clicking to be _not_ matched to its parent media item.
